name: The Other Office
description:
This single level prototype was created for a university assignment in 2020.

It was an ordinary day at the office… Until Ted found a door with a magical void behind it that led to another world – another office – where everything is larger than life. Now Ted needs to find is way back to the door, finding all the missing pieces of the key to unlock it on the way. But be wary, evil stationery patrols the shelves and the floor is LITERALLY lava!
